name: 3oh1
body:
### Welcome to 3oh1.io
3oh1.io is a URL-Shortener that you can host yourself. Like bit.ly or goo.gl you can shorten URLs, manage your existing shorteners and activate / deactivate them. But the main difference is that your host your own service, with your own domain. Additionally your don't have to rely on any service that may go out of business. Just host it on your own server.

### Authors and Contributors
The 3oh1 project is a open source project of Manning Publications (http://www.manning.com/). It was created by Mario David (@mariodavid) and Matthias Hamann (@bresche). 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the app? Don't hesitate to contact us via mail (3oh1@manning.com), raise a ticket at https://github.com/ManningPublications/3oh1/issues or create a pull request.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
